projects.title: Super Simple Chat APP
projects.description: In this project, I spearheaded the development of a dynamic single-channel group chat application, harnessing the power of PostgreSQL for seamless data storage and implementing lightning-fast real-time messaging using JSON web sockets. Showcasing my skills in database management and in asynchronous communication technologies, I engineered a robust solution that exemplifies innovation and efficiency in modern software development.

projects.title: Twitter Showcase APP
projects.description: In this project, I engineered a Twitter Showcase app, actively engaging in full-stack development to craft both the front-end and back-end. This hands-on approach illuminated the seamless fusion and autonomy of each layer, highlighting my adeptness in integrating diverse components. Through this endeavor, I deepened my expertise in APIs and honed my comprehension of the intricate interplay between client and server-side operations, affirming my readiness to tackle complex software challenges with finesse.

projects.title: Basic Retro Calculator APP
projects.description: I developed a calculator app, a project that challenged me to meticulously debug and balance multiple functions, significantly enhancing my skills in event-driven programming and logical problem-solving. This process, while time-consuming, has greatly improved my proficiency with event handlers and debugging techniques, marking a substantial growth in my programming capabilities.

projects.title: Simple Expense Tracker
projects.description: I developed a Simple Expense Tracker app as my inaugural project with React, delving into the framework's complexities and integrating Bootstrap 5 for styling, which enhanced my understanding of framework utility and CSS management. This experience has not only broadened my technical skillset but also prepared me for future projects leveraging these technologies.

projects.title: Star Wars API
projects.description: In developing a Star Wars app using the Star Wars API, I deepened my knowledge of React, JavaScript, and Bootstrap 5, focusing on Bootstrap for styling and minimizing CSS use to streamline the design process. This project significantly enhanced my understanding of promises and data manipulation, including using Axios for API calls and dynamically adjusting UI elements like buttons and navigation based on data presence, showcasing my growing expertise in asynchronous programming and user interface development.

projects.title: Classic Hangman Game
projects.description: I developed a classic hangman game, selecting from over 200,000 words for gameplay through file manipulation and implementing the project using object-oriented programming (OOP), marking my first venture into OOP and showcasing my ability to manage large datasets and apply modern programming paradigms.

projects.title: Passcode Grid
projects.description: Inspired by the Canada Revenue Agency's authentication process, I developed a passcode grid app that enhances security by requiring users to input characters from randomly selected grid coordinates after logging in, showcasing my ability to implement complex authentication mechanisms and simulate real-world security measures in software development.

projects.title: Add more sections!
projects.description: The starter includes predefined sections as well as a template for new, custom sections. Moreover, you can add new projects to this section without additional coding. Photo by Kelly Sikkema on Unsplash.

projects.title: Add more sections!
projects.description: The starter includes predefined sections as well as a template for new, custom sections. Moreover, you can add new projects to this section without additional coding. Photo by Kelly Sikkema on Unsplash.
